abstract: An experimental drug for eczema relieved severity of symptoms in 85 percent of those who took it. A drug for psoriasis cut severity of symptoms in as many as 82 percent of those who took it.
snippet: An experimental drug for eczema relieved severity of symptoms in 85 percent of those who took it. A drug for psoriasis cut severity of symptoms in as many as 82 percent of those who took it.
lead_paragraph: New drugs that block highly specific parts of the immune system are showing remarkable promise in treating two maddening skin diseases, eczema and psoriasis, according to papers published Wednesday in a leading medical journal.

headline.main: In Small Trials, 2 Drugs Go Far in Soothing Symptoms of Eczema and Psoriasis
headline.print_headline: In Small Trials, 2 Drugs Go Far in Soothing Symptoms of Eczema and Psoriasis
